member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_SHAPE_INFO
member.summary: The DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_SHAPE_INFO structure describes information about the cursor shape.

member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_SHAPE_INFO.Type
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the type of cursor shape.

member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_SHAPE_INFO.Width
member.summary: The width in pixels of the mouse cursor.

member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_SHAPE_INFO.Height
member.summary: The height in scan lines of the mouse cursor.

member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_SHAPE_INFO.Pitch
member.summary: The width in bytes of the mouse cursor.

member.name: DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_SHAPE_INFO.HotSpot
member.summary: The position of the cursor's hot spot relative to its upper-left pixel. An application does not use the hot spot when it determines where to draw the cursor shape.
